name: THE GUARDIAN LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY OF AMERICA
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to dental care and coverage and related health issues.

H.R. 6 - Support for Patients and Communities Act - Work to include policies related to ensuring that evidence based programs and policies are part of the standard of prevention, treatment and care for individuals and their families combatting opioid and substance use disorders. 

Work to educate and advocate for greater access and coverage of dental, hearing and eye care in the public and private insurance markets.

Support for Congressional efforts to encourage the appointment of a new Chief Dental Officer for CMS.
